definition: (of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to

sentences.english: Molly was miserable after she got a bad sunburn on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉在海灘被太陽曬傷後就很慘。

sentences.english: You will get sunburnt if you expose your skin to the sun too long.
sentences.chinese: 如果你將皮膚暴露在太陽底下太久，會被曬傷的。

sentences.english: Your face and neck are sunburned.
sentences.chinese: 你的臉還有脖子都曬傷了。

sentences.english: Getting sunburnt on the first day sucks.
sentences.chinese: 入營第一天就被曬傷真讓人鬱悶。

sentences.english: Product does not contain any sunscreen to protect against sunburn.
sentences.chinese: 產品中不含任何遮光劑來防止曬傷。

sentences.english: If we get burned, it has a reverse effect, it's not healthy.
sentences.chinese: 要是曬傷了，那就起到反作用了，不健康了。

sentences.english: But be careful, don't get sunburned.
sentences.chinese: 但是也要小心，不要曬傷了皮膚哦。

sentences.english: You might get  sunburned if you stay in strong sunlight for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 如果在強烈的陽光下呆得太久，你可能會被曬傷的。

sentences.english: Sunburn is still possible in the winter because the snow reflects the sun's rays.
sentences.chinese: 冬天裏仍然可能會有曬傷，因爲雪會反射太陽輻射。

sentences.english: How should be done by skin of intense insolation injury?
sentences.chinese: 被烈日曬傷皮膚該怎麼辦？

sentences.english: The pig is the only animal that burns with the sun than man.
sentences.chinese: 豬是唯一一種比人更容易曬傷的動物。

sentences.english: When you're drying it, don'tworry about things like sunburns.
sentences.chinese: 當你乾燥它，不要擔心像曬傷的事情。

sentences.english: Those with lighter skin will usually burn faster than those with darker or  olive skin.
sentences.chinese: 亮色皮膚總比暗色或橄欖色肌膚的人容易曬傷。

sentences.english: Why are we more likely to get sunburns on the beach?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼在海灘上更容易曬傷？

sentences.english: I can get sunburned through a window.
sentences.chinese: 窗子照進來的光線也可以把我曬傷？

sentences.english: I didn't get sunburned since I was wearing sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我當時搽了防曬油，因此沒有曬傷。

definition: to sunbathe/to tan/to get sunburnt/to expose unfair practices (on a consumer protection website)
(of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
a burn (tissue damage from heat, chemicals etc)/to burn (the skin etc)/(fig.) (of anger, jealousy etc) to hurt (sb)
correct/normal/to be on good terms with/on the right track/right
